review:
Doctor Sunil Oberoi, Dental Surgen was coordial and helpful. He worked patiently without trouble. He always listens the patient during the process.  He always  use sterilized tools. He is very careful during the surgery for implant. I strongly recommend him for all devoted work

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had dental issues for long and after careful consideration had my dental implants from stunning dentistry. 
All appointments were presheduled and on time. Doctor Sunil were through professionals and the team took care of the complete process smoothly. I am very satisfied with Dr. SUNIL and Ms Priyanka Oberai. Will definitely recommend stunning dentistry to anyone having severe dental issues.
Higley recommend this best dental clinic.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Sunil was quick to identify and explain the issues in detail. He ensured that the entire procedure was done in a single sitting upon my request. His patience in dealing with patients (with a wide range of issues) is very commendable.
He constantly took feedback from me during the procedure to address all my concerns in the best possible way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sunil is a charismatic person. He is my family dentist from last 16 years. He does his job with perfection and make sure his patients are happy and satisfied. He also make sure patient always must have beautiful smile when he leave the clinic. Thanks
